act_name: GENIUS Act (Guiding and Establishing National Innovation for US Stablecoins)

milestones.milestone: FDIC proposed rulemaking for bank stablecoin issuance
OCC guidance on national bank stablecoin activities
milestones.detail: Interpretive letters confirm custody and issuance

milestones.milestone: Final regulations issued by federal agencies

milestones.detail: 18 months post-enactment or 120 days after final regs, whichever is earlier
Treasury Secretary determines which foreign stablecoin regimes are compatible

milestones.milestone: First GENIUS Act-approved payment stablecoin issuer
State regulatory certification of substantial similarity
milestones.detail: 1 year post-effective date for state regimes to certify

milestones.milestone: Prohibition on non-approved issuers takes effect
milestones.detail: 3 years post-enactment, only approved issuers may operate
